rules_text:
Target player sacrifices a creature.
Monument {4}{B} [i](You may cast this transformed from your graveyard for its monument cost. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Whenever you condemn a creature, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
{4}{B}: Judge target creature you control. [i](Honor it by putting a +1/+1 counter on it or condemn it by sacrificing it to draw a card.)[/i]
